headline: Why this portfolio mgr. is eyeing Carvana, Seagate, Live Nation
summary: Globalt Investments Senior Portfolio Manager Thomas Martin shares his two latest stock picks: online auto retailer Carvana (CVNA), data storage developer Seagate Technology (STX, 847.BE), and live event promoter and ticketing company Live Nation Entertainment (LYV). Also hear Thomas Martin explain what Federal Reserve officials demonstrated at their latest FOMC meeting, where they cut interest rates for the final time in 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
